image:image.image:title: Ugandan Sweet Potato (Ipomoea batatas) – Export-Certified Roots
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan sweet potatoes (Ipomoea batatas), also called sweet potato, prized for natural sweetness, dense nutrition, and reliable year-round supply. Export-certified, cold-chain handled, and air-freighted from Entebbe.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Matoke (Musa acuminata) – Green Bananas Export
image:image.image:caption: Matoke (Musa acuminata), also known as green bananas, hand-picked, export-graded, and air-freighted fresh from Uganda to UK, EU, and Gulf wholesale buyers.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Hot Peppers (Capsicum spp.) – Bird’s Eye Chilli & Scotch Bonnet
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan hot peppers (Capsicum spp., incl. C. chinense, C. frutescens), also called African bird’s eye chilli and Scotch bonnet, export-certified, cold-chain handled, and shipped by air to global spice buyers.

image:image.image:title: White African Eggplant (Solanum aethiopicum) – Garden Egg Export
image:image.image:caption: White African eggplant (Solanum aethiopicum), also called garden egg or njanja, smooth-skinned and firm-textured, export-certified and air-freighted from Uganda.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Cocoyam (Xanthosoma sagittifolium) – Malanga Export
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan cocoyam (Xanthosoma sagittifolium), also known as malanga or tannia, nutrient-rich root crop with starchy texture, export-certified and bulk-packed for wholesale buyers.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Sugar Cane (Saccharum officinarum) – Fresh-Cut Export
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan fresh-cut sugar cane (Saccharum officinarum), also called fresh-cut cane, sweet and juicy, trimmed and bundled to export specifications for airfreight.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Ginger (Zingiber officinale) – Fresh Root Export
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan ginger (Zingiber officinale), also called fresh ginger root, aromatic export-grade rhizomes, cold-chain handled and air-freighted to international spice buyers.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Avocado (Persea americana) – Butter Fruit Export
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan avocados (Persea americana), also called butter fruit or Uganda avocado, creamy and nutrient-rich, export-certified and shipped fresh by air.

image:image.image:title: Ugandan Apple Bananas (Musa acuminata, Sukali Ndizi) – Export Variety
image:image.image:caption: Ugandan apple bananas (Musa acuminata, Sukali ndizi cultivar), locally called Sukali ndizi, sweet and firm, export-certified and air-freighted fresh for premium wholesale buyers.
